meanings.definition: A person who pretends to be someone they are not.
meanings.sent1: The shammers at the party claimed to be famous actors.

meanings.sent3: The shammers tried to convince everyone he was a secret agent, but his clumsiness gave him away.
meanings.sent4: His disguise was so good that he fooled everyone, truly a master shammers.
